title: Q8 Word Choice MC
prompt: Which word, when added in the blank, would <u>best</u> support the comparison of the road to a soft-serve yogurt?
description:
Read this sentence.

The road __________ up the mountain like a soft-serve yogurt.
feedback: The best choice is “spiraled.” This is the shape of soft-serve yogurt in a conical shape. The yogurt spirals to the top. The word “went” doesn’t indicate the shape or path of the road. The word “extended,” meaning “went farther,” also doesn’t support the comparison; if anything it implies that the road might be straight. The word “withdrew” would mean the road pulled away or left. It’s inappropriate in the sentence.
